metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5274 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the view operations page in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.3 and 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted view name, related to js/functions.js.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.7.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.7.1-1').
